comments.content:
I’m not sure what the formal relationship is (advisor? employee? consultant?), but Frutiger’s recent releases, like his reworkings of Avenir and Palatino, have come from Linotype.

[http://www.linotype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080110085601/http:/www.linotype.com/ "http://www.linotype.com")

Coincidentally (or perhaps not), another student is trying to contact Akira Kobayashi, who has a senior position at Linotype and has collaborated with Frutiger on several faces. The advice here may also prove useful:

[http://typophile.com/node/38254](http://web.archive.org/web/20080110085601/http:/typophile.com/node/38254 "http://typophile.com/node/38254")
